query:
SELECT i.id, i.name
        FROM borrow b
        JOIN (
            SELECT item_id, MAX(ordering) AS max_ordering
            FROM borrow
            GROUP BY item_id
        ) AS max_orders
        ON b.item_id = max_orders.item_id 
        JOIN items i ON b.item_id = i.id
        WHERE b.ordering = max_orders.max_ordering AND b.to_user = ?;
